replies.msg: It is with great sadness to let you know that Paul Forster, our dear colleague, and good friend, passed away at around 4 p.m. on 2 December 2020 in the TKO Hospital surrounded by his beloved family, his wife Vivien and two children, Claire and John, after a brief illness.  This memorial website was created in memory of our loved one. We will remember him forever.
